basics.name: Alexey Ivanov
basics.label: Front-End / Software / React / Developer
basics.summary: A Frontend/Software Developer with over 5 years of experience in enterprise and startup settings; specializing in ReactJS and TypeScript, with a strong skill set toward a number of tech stacks for dynamic and scalable frontends. Known for cloud resource optimization and creative problem- solving for Airbnb, Facebook, and other clients, enhancing system performance, security, and scalability.

work.name: Self Employed
work.description: As a self-employed software developer, I specialize in crafting e-commerce solutions tailored for online food sales, achieving measurable outcomes:
work.summary: — Led development of e-commerce platforms resulting in a 20% increase in online food retail sales
highlights: Next / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Node/ Express / MongoDB

work.name: Global Relay
work.description: Global Relay is a leading provider of cloud-based messaging, archiving, and compliance solutions for the financial services industry, committed to implementing best practices and fostering a collaborative, clean environment to ensure optimal performance and security.
work.summary:
— Improved the maintainability and scalability of a new frontend architecture, and reduced system errors by 20% through collaborative
teamwork and optimization that included rigorous code review and unit testing.
— Empowered users by implementing the functionality that would allow them to choose stronger and more secure passwords, using the best practices of the respective industry with full unit tests.
— Reduced technical debt by refactoring legacy system components; achieved a 25% increase in system performance due to effective optimization and extensive unit testing.
— Improved documentation of the design, updated and made the distinctness in the project more transparent and easier to understand, thus giving 20% development time back through the emphasis on best practices with respect to documentation and strict unit testing.
— Over the past year, he addressed a large number of security and quality issues through collaborative debugging and detailed unit testing.
— Managed the onboarding of 5 CO-OPs through dedicated mentorship and individualized training programs that promoted teamwork and collaborative learning.
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Docker / Kubernetes / Figma / Jest / React - testing - library / Git / Webpack

work.name: Capgemini Engineering
work.description: Top-1 global engineering and digital services company
work.summary:
— Contributed to developing a data pipeline monitoring application by creating and improving the API functionality, resulting in a 40% improvement in data processing efficiency.
— Expanded UI with additional pipeline parameters, boosting user engagement by 30%.
— Restructured application infrastructure to functional components/hooks.
— Implemented TypeScript and rigorously conducted unit testing, reducing bugs by 30% and increasing code coverage by 20%, ensuring robust code quality and reliability.
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Jest / React - testing - library / Git / Webpack

work.name: Barsum Cloud Analytics
work.description: A leader in the Russian market, which designs software that helps banks run and save money in managing the­ir cloud systems
work.summary:
— Developed applications for the largest banks, optimized cloud resource consumption by 25%, reducing operational costs.
— Designed and developed user interfaces, increasing user satisfaction by 30% with the integration of seamless backends for data retrieval and presentation.
— Implemented business logic to calculate total resource consumption, thus enabled the performance of effective mass user operations, thereby reducing processing time by 20%.
highlights: React / Typescript / HTML / SCSS / Redux / Git / Webpack
